history.content: Everything is possible. But the workload will be pretty big. If you are fully prepared and you can take four technical in one regular semester easily, then you may be fine. If you just pnp 162 and take it just for learning the material, then you may be also fine as long as you pay much effort.

<md>I wondering if there is any possibility to do both CS 162 + Internship in a big tech company in this summer as I will be graduated in December this year and didn't have a chance to get enrolled in CS 162 for this fall.

My preliminary idea is like fully preparing everything as possible as I can (watch all lecture videos, go through all possible resources/readings right after this semester) as both course and internship will start later. The ideal time goal for each week would be 90 hours or so during summer.

I really don't have idea for both CS 162 course workload(assuming good team of 3~4), especially in summer and summer internship, so please don't blame too much if this sounds like really stupid or much worse than suicidal...

What about PNP it as LS CS major?</md>
history.subject: CS 162 + Internship...in summer?
